ingredients.raw: ½ cup (122g) pure pumpkin puree (make sure it’s super smooth &#8211; some brands are a little thicker with chunks. If this is the case, blend with the water to smooth it out completely)

expected.item: pure pumpkin puree (make sure it’s super smooth - some brands are a little thicker with chunks. If this is the case, blend with the water to smooth it out completely)

ingredients.raw: 2½ teaspoons pumpkin pie spice, or 1 teaspoon cinnamon, ½ teaspoon ginger, ½ teaspoon nutmeg, &amp; 1/8 teaspoon cloves

expected.note: or 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon ginger, 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg, & 1/8 teaspoon cloves

ingredients.raw: ½ cup sugar-free maple syrup (I used Wholesome Yum Zero Sugar Maple Syrup &#8211; you may need more or less based on how sweet your syrup replacement is. Different types of sugar-free sweeteners vary in sweetness levels.)

expected.note: I used Wholesome Yum Zero Sugar Maple Syrup - you may need more or less based on how sweet your syrup replacement is. Different types of sugar-free sweeteners vary in sweetness levels.
